text.name: info1
text.text: Stratagus is an open-source game engine used to build real-time

text.name: info2
text.text: strategy games. The engine is written in C++ and uses the Lua

text.name: info3
text.text: language for implementing actual game logic. Among other

text.name: info4
text.text: features it supports playing over the Internet or via LAN.
